featured.text: Many areas will also organize bon-odori dances.

other.text: Since the 1990s, alternative proms have been organized in some areas to meet the needs of particular students.
Which of the following statements is true? (A) Unconventional proms have been organized since the 1960s.

definition.en_def: To arrange or systematize in a structured way.
definition.example: She decided to organize her closet by color.
